overview: It was very late when the parents returned home from their evening out. So late they felt it best that the babysitter should just spend the night. And so it happened, in the twilight hours while getting a glass of water Mr. Smith was invited to sit and talk with the young little babysitter and he did more than just talk...
tagline: Sweet Little Things That Will Do Anything For A Buck.
title: The Babysitter 16
